short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: kvCORE's chrome extension tools. Including: Auto-posting to craigslist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is made to accompany kvCORE Real Estate Platform.

Post to Craigslist features:
- Auto-detect your Craigslist Region/City
- Auto-post a listing to Craiglist
- Auto-detect whether listing is "for sale" or "for rent" and publish accordingly
